progetto

Class ServerGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.GameSync
      • progetto.ServerGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISync

    public class ServerGame
extends GameSync
implements ISync
    A server game is a game structure that will send action to the underlying game and will provide to the room the list of enforce that must be sent to the players

        public void sendItem(java.io.Serializable s)

      • addItemEnforce

        private void addItemEnforce(IEnforce enforce,
                            int origin)
        check if the enforce that must be added is already present, if it is erases the last one.
        Parameters:
        enforce - the enforce to be sent
        origin - the id of the enforces that must replace
